author: Sharky The King
name: Message Tracker
install_msg: Thank you for installing msgtracker! Please note you can disable members from having access to `[p]trackignore`.
description: Message tracker counter, count how many people have messaged in your server and display it in a leaderboard.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores User IDs and counts how many messages you send in a server, unless you / the staff of the server has set you ignored from the bot. This cog is accepting full removal and blocking.
